title: Organizational Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Goal-Oriented Online Training for Foundational Organic Chemistry Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze functional group structures of organic compounds and derive similarities
Learners can conceptually explain the impact of molecular structural differences on chemical reactions
Learners can apply expert thinking processes (prediction-verification-connection) when solving organic chemistry problems

Learners can compile a five-page analysis report integrating reaction mechanisms and experimental data and achieve ≥80 points on the report evaluation rubric (data accuracy 25%, interpretive logic 30%, conclusion validity 25%, report structure 20%).
Learners can explain everyday chemical phenomena (e.g., food preservation, pharmaceutical synthesis) using organic chemistry principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
